com.bank

Class BankController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bank.BankController

  • public class BankController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the central controller and communicator between the bank and users
    Author:
    Dave Wroblewski

      • logIn

        public void logIn(int inAccountNumber,
                  int inPin)
           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                  com.bank.InvalidAccountException
        Checks against a map to verify correct information entered to access account
        Parameters:
        inAccountNumber - the number of the current account being accessed
        inPin - the corresponding pin associated with the account
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        com.bank.InvalidAccountException

      • transferCheckingAndSaving

        public static void transferCheckingAndSaving(boolean forward,
                                             int inAccountNumber)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Transfers money between checking and savings and vice versa inside the same account
        Parameters:
        forward - boolean variable, if true transfer is from checking into savings. False is savings into checking
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • transferToOutsideAccount

        public static void transferToOutsideAccount(boolean forward,
                                            int inAccountNumber)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Transfers money from one account to another
        Parameters:
        forward - If true, transfer is made from savings, if false transfer is made from checking
        inAccountNumber -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkBalance

        public static void checkBalance(int inAccountNumber,
                                int inType)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a print out of the account balance
        Parameters:
        inAccountNumber - The number of the account currently being accessed
        inType - 1 to stop execution before continuation and wait for user to hit enter, 0 to continue through execution
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deposit

        public static void deposit(int inAccountNumber,
                           java.lang.String inAccountType)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Allows the user to deposit funds into the account
        Parameters:
        inAccountNumber - The number of the account currently being accessed
        inAccountType - The type of account (Checking/Savings) you wish to interact with
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • withdraw

        public static void withdraw(int inAccountNumber,
                            java.lang.String inAccountType)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Allows user to withdraw from an account
        Parameters:
        inAccountNumber - The number of the account currently being accessed
        inAccountType - The type of account (Checking/Savings) you wish to interact with
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
